title: Lisa's List of Places to Eat or Drink
name: Lisa's List of Places to Eat or Drink

properties.name: Dolce Vita Ristorante
properties.description: Posted by Lisabiddie 221 Hanover St., BostonItalian food located in the Northend of Boston If something you want isn\'t on the menu just ask and he will make it for you!

properties.name: Frank Pepe's Pizza
properties.description: Posted by Lisabiddie157 Wooster Street, New Haven CTFRANK PEPE PIZZERIA NAPOLETANA A true delicious Brick oven pizza! Since 1925, Pepe\'s has been synonymous with pizzas in the city\'s Wooster Square Italian neighborhood. Hours - Mon - Sat 11:30 AM - 10:00PM Sunday… NOON - 10:00PM

properties.name: Home Run Inn
properties.description: Posted by Lisabiddie 7521 Lemont Road Darien IL.

properties.name: Piece
properties.description: Posted by Lisabiddie1927 W. North Ave. ChicagoPizza/Brewery - Piece unites classic New Haven CT.-style thin crust pizza with award-winning microbrews in a spacious loft setting. We opened in July 2001 after transforming a roofing company garage into a casual pizzeria complete with a skylite ceiling and sunken lounge area. Sports fans can catch events on a series of eleven 42” plasma TVs that span the length of the bar. Revelers pack the house for games and special events. tel: 773-772-4422 Brewer Jonathan Cutler has won twelve major awards in five years of operation. In 2006 Piece and Jonathan won the prestigious World Beer Cup Champion Small Brewpub and Brewmaster Award. Be sure to stop by and try one of our award winning brews.

properties.name: Trattoria Scalinatella
properties.description: Posted by Lisabiddie253 Hanover St. Boston, MA 02113Look carefully so you don\'t miss the sign by the stairs, then climb up to this cozy nook where even first-timers are warmly welcomed. Try the tasting menu, which includes wine. Treat yourself to delicious indulgences, including nightly bruschetta variations, homemade pastas, seafood, grilled meats, and decadent dolci. 20373$ (1–0) Price
